author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Americans warned to avoid Malaysian tourist spotTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Americans warned to avoid Malaysian tourist spot Published on : Saturday, September 26, 2015
In a fresh crisis, the US embassy in Malaysia warned American citizens in the country on Thursday to avoid a popular tourist street in the capital Kuala Lumpur perceiving “credible threat information regarding a potential terrorist act.”
The embassy website issued the security warning for Jalan Alor, a street in the popular tourist district of Bukit Bintang, and the immediate surrounding areas.
However, Malaysian police officials could not immediately be reached for comment. Local media said police had increased patrols in Jalan Alor and surrounding areas.
The threat was linked to the arrests of several militants connected to Isil in the past month, Malaysian media reported, quoting police sources.
